subject: Re: [junit] Our tests are not compatibel with JUnit 3.8.1, why?
msgSnippet: ... For JUnit 3 Test suites, you should use @RunWith(AllTests.class) BTW, this isn t a JUnit problem, but specific to how Eclipse determines which version of
messageBody:
Hans Schwaebli schrieb:
> It does not work for test suites.

For JUnit 3 Test suites, you should use

@RunWith(AllTests.class)

BTW, this isn't a JUnit problem, but specific to how Eclipse determines
which version of its own runner to use.

Cheers, Ilja
